name: ionic-angular-firebase-tools
description: Auto-updating Docker image based on NodeJS official image with Ionic, Angular CLI and Firebase Tools installed.

scripts.version:commit: git commit -am "chore(release): Bump version to $(npm run version:current --silent)"
scripts.version:major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && npm run version:commit
scripts.version:minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run version:commit
scripts.version:patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run version:commit
scripts.docker:build:push: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:tag && npm run docker:push

author: roalcantara
